seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Bilingual coaching plans for UK newcomers, returners, graduates, and mid-career professionals.

hero.title: Services
hero.subtitle: Structured yet flexible coaching plans that honour your pace, culture, and goals.

plans.title: Coaching plans built around your context
plans.intro: Each plan provides a starting structure. We fine-tune cadence, language, and support once we understand your priorities.

items.title: Landing in the UK coaching series
items.audience: Internationally trained professionals and newcomers learning how UK workplaces operate.
items.format: 4–6 sessions over 8–12 weeks; 50-minute virtual sessions with optional bilingual summaries.
items.process: We start with clarity on goals, support systems, and cultural questions, then alternate reflection and experiment design check-ins.
items.outcomes: Map the norms you need to decode, rehearse key conversations, and test low-risk experiments to build confidence.

items.title: Mid-career recalibration
items.audience: Mid-career leaders weighing role changes, portfolio careers, or postgraduate study.
items.format: 6 sessions across 3–4 months; remote conversations plus light asynchronous prompts between meetings.
items.process: We combine values clarification, stakeholder mapping, and experiment ladders to evaluate options in your real context.
items.outcomes: Define decision criteria, design small trials, and craft narratives for senior stakeholders or hiring panels.

items.title: Return-to-work runway
items.audience: Professionals re-entering work after caregiving, health, or relocation pauses.
items.format: 5 sessions over 10–14 weeks; bilingual coaching with practical templates for routines and conversations.
items.process: We begin with a gentle debrief of the pause, then co-design energy checkpoints, support requests, and experiments that rebuild momentum.
items.outcomes: Tell a grounded return story, set sustainable routines, and create check-ins for the first 90 days back.

items.title: Graduate & early-career lab
items.audience: Recent graduates or career shifters preparing for their first professional role in the UK.
items.format: 4 sessions across 8 weeks; remote coaching with optional peer practice activities.
items.process: We blend reflective questions with scenario rehearsal around interviews, onboarding, and everyday workplace communication.
items.outcomes: Name your strengths, design learning experiments, and set up accountability that keeps you moving without overwhelm.

partnership.title: What we hold in every engagement
partnership.lead: Regardless of the plan, you receive steady partnership that keeps ethics, pace, and context in view.

items.title: ICF-aligned ethics
items.description: We work under the International Coaching Federation code, with informed consent, clear confidentiality boundaries, and supervision when needed.

items.title: Co-created experiments
items.description: You lead the agenda. We co-design reflective practices and real-world experiments that you own, iterate, or decline.

items.title: Bilingual, culturally aware support
items.description: Sessions can move between English and Mandarin. We stay mindful of both UK workplace norms and the nuances of Chinese-speaking cultures.

notes: We regularly review usefulness, pause when required, and signpost therapy, legal, or medical professionals if that becomes more appropriate.

boundaries.title: Where coaching is not a fit
items: Therapy, counselling, psychiatric care, or crisis intervention.
Immigration, legal, tax, or financial advice.

logistics.title: Practical details
items: Sessions are online in UK time. We agree on scheduling windows that respect your other commitments.
Pricing is shared after the intro call once scope and organisational sponsorship (if any) are clear.
We keep light, client-owned session notes and store data in UK/EU compliant systems.
